title: Mycenaean cemetery at Aidonia
description: Mycenaean burial ground located approximately 8 kilometers west of Nemea containing 20 tombs dated to the 15th century BCE. All but two of the burials were looted in the 1970s, but the illicit finds were retrieved and repatriated to Greece in 1996.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate centerpoint of the Mycenaean cemetery at Aidonia, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node.
properties.title: OSM location of Mycenaean cemetery at Aidonia
